title: The.Assange.Agenda.Surveillance.Democracy.and.You.Pink.Hand.720p
description:
<a href="http://hotspots.co/assangedocumentary/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://hotspots.co/assangedocumentary/</a>

Description

The Assange Agenda is a provocative film that has experts looking deeper into the issues that Julian Assange is pursuing in his bid for a seat in the Australian Senate.

Made against a backdrop of recent leaks by NSA Whistleblower, Edward Snowden, who revealed the far reaching extent of surveillance of citizens, governments and officials by US Government Agencies. The documentary asks some key experts to examine the choices democracies face at this crucial moment in history.

It raises issues about privacy, surveillance, open government, civil liberties, torture and in the end what democracy means in the information age.

How much are we under surveillance? Can we protect our privacy and civil liberties? What would happen if this information fell into the wrong hands?

This film looks deeper at the implications for democracy in the information age and how we could be effected.

It was directed by Michael Weatherhead and Dr Lucy Anna Rhoades and produced to preempt the elections in Australia in 2013 as Assange stands for the Senate.

____________________________________

If you like it, support Assange and rent the movie!
